attributes.action: create more places for the youth to go such as clubs for younger people, because most clubs and hang out places are for over eighteens only which causes the younger generation to walk the streets or cause trouble.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: create more places for the youth to go such as clubs for younger people, because most clubs and hang out places are for over eighteens only which causes the younger generation to walk the streets or cause trouble. if there was more clubs for under 18s only more of the youth would be socailising there not in the streets making gangs and this could also be a place for them to socailize and show talents such as dancing skills and singing skills.
